app.utils

Class HelperMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.utils.HelperMethods

  • public class HelperMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides various helper methods which will me used throughout the entire application.

      • alertBox

        public static void alertBox(java.lang.String infoMessage,
                            java.lang.String headerText,
                            java.lang.String title)
        This method is used to create an alertBox.
        Parameters:
        infoMessage - First parameter is a string to be used as ContentText.
        headerText - First parameter is a string to be used as HeaderText.
        title - Third parameter is a string to be used as alertBox title.
        Since:
        1.0.0
